scripts.postinstall: cp node_modules/jquery.terminal/js/jquery.terminal.min.js* public/js/. && cp node_modules/jquery.terminal/js/jquery.mousewheel-min* public/js/. && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js* public/js/. && cp node_modules/jquery.terminal/css/jquery.terminal.min.css* public/css/.
